Ever wondered what a vaccine packaging process looks like? Step 1/4: vaccine vials get fed into the labeling machine https://t.co/wYuJO6xHON
Step 2/4: 425 vials per minute move through the machine and are labelled #WorldPolioDay https://t.co/YV00zwZEfY
Step 3/4: the labelled vials are packed, 100 to a box. 100,00 vials are packed per 8 hour shift #WorldPolioDay https://t.co/WZeOp9bI29
Step 4/4: small boxes are packed into larger boxes to be sent to @UNICEFpolio for distribution to those most need it https://t.co/XT3OaqKQb0
